Text:
Just created a tpb ID to rectify the INSTRUCTIONS given by the uploader. I have the following steps working on my Windows 8 system.

1. Install GmailNotifierPro 4.6.3
2. After installation and inital run, Exit the app from the tray.
3. Run keygen and input your credentials, and copy the code.
4. Go to C:Users\AppDataRoamingGmailNotifierPro. Here you will find ConfigData.xml. Open it with notepad.
5. Find the line . Select it whole and paste the code copied from the keygen. Remove any whitespaces if any.
6. Restart GmailNotifierPro.

Sorry for step 4. It was unintentional.
Correction. C:\Users\Username\AppData\Roaming\GmailNotifierPro\

I've replaced the  with the generated one but still unable to be verified.
Please help

Find what fucking line?!?!?

What line???
Find the fucking line : RegisteredUser, you fucking d1ckhead
